name: Disarm
description:
How to play:
 WASD / Arrow Keys to move around
 Space to dash
 Get the enemies to shoot each other
 Survive for as long as possible to get the highest score possible
 You gain points when enemies die

Known Bugs:
 - Some animations glitch
 - Some of the UI doesn't always scale correctly
 - Score keeps counting once game is over

IF YOU FIND A BUG PLEASE REPORT IT IN THE COMMENTS

If I Had More Time I Would Have Added:
 - More enemies
 - Powerups
 - Different Levels
 - Options menu to lower music volume
 - Tutorial

Credits:
 Everything made by me except font and music
 Music by the Ecrett music bot
